</traits>

**Perception** +14; darkvision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

</column>

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +17,
**Damage** 2d8+8 piercing plus giant tarantula venom

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
leg +17 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d12+8 bludgeoning plus Knockdown

**Hair Barrage** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The tarantula flicks its legs, flinging spiky hairs in a 15-foot cone. This deals 4d6 piercing damage with a DC 25 basic Reflex save.

**Giant Tarantula Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 23; **Maximum Duration** 8 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison, flat-footed, and clumsy 1 (1 round); **Stage 3** 1d6 poison, flat-footed, and clumsy 2; **Stage 4** 1d6 poison and paralyzed (1 round).

</column>
